content: here for toddler size k8 k2tog repeat all around k1 round 90sts *start here for baby size k7 k2tog repeat all around k1 round 80sts k6 k2tog repeat around k1 round 70sts k5 k2tog repeat around k1 round 60sts k4 k2tog repeat around k1 round 50sts k3 k2tog repeat around k1 round 40sts k2 k2tog repeat around k1 round 30sts k1 k2tog around k1 round 20sts k2tog around 10sts go to the finishing section on the front page
